definition: large in spatial extent or range or scope or quantity
details:
adjective
- large in spatial extent or range or scope or quantity
= synonyms: extensive
- beyond the literal or primary sense
= example: beyond the literal or primary sense
- fully extended or stretched forth
= example: fully extended or stretched forth
- drawn out or made longer spatially
= synonyms: elongated, lengthened, prolonged
- relatively long in duration
= synonyms: drawn-out
